HomePage.intro: Hi, I'm Raden Dewa Saktia Purnama
HomePage.resume: I am a senior student majoring in Computer Science with a strong interest in digital design, particularly UI/UX, web and mobile interface design, and visual content creation. I am proficient in using tools such as Figma, Adobe Photoshop, and Canva to produce intuitive and engaging designs. My experience includes user research, wireframing, prototyping, and user flow creation, which I learned through personal projects and the UI/UX Bootcamp from Infinite Learning. I am an open-minded, quick learner, and enthusiastic about collaborating on impactful digital design projects.

AboutPage.title: About
AboutPage.description: A brief introduction to who I am.

resume.paragraf_1: Hello everyone, thank you for visiting my personal website. I am Raden Dewa Saktia Purnama, a final-year Informatics student with a strong interest in digital design, particularly in UI/UX design, web and mobile interface design, and creating visual content. I believe that design is not just about appearance, but also about creating intuitive and enjoyable user experiences.
resume.paragraf_2: I am proficient in tools such as Canva, Adobe Photoshop, and Figma, which I use in various personal projects and training sessions. To further develop my skills professionally, I have completed a UI/UX Bootcamp from Infinite Learning, equipping me with expertise in user research, wireframing, user flows, and prototyping.
resume.paragraf_3: I am an open-minded, quick learner, and enthusiastic individual dedicated to developing impactful design solutions. I am open to various opportunities such as internships, freelance work, or project collaborations in digital design. Let's connect and share creative ideas together!
